acceptanceText: By accessing and using this service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
serviceDescriptionText: Our service provides a comprehensive platform for building modern web applications with advanced theming and internationalization capabilities.
userAccountsText: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for:
accountResponsibility1: Safeguarding the password and maintaining the security of your account
accountResponsibility2: All activities that occur under your account
accountResponsibility3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account
prohibitedUseText: You may not use our service:
prohibited1: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
prohibited2: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
prohibited3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
prohibited4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
intellectualPropertyText: The service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company and its licensors.
terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
disclaimerText: The information on this service is provided on an 'as is' basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, this Company excludes all representations, warranties, conditions and terms.
contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@example.com
informationCollectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support:
personalInfo3: Communications with us and usage data
informationUseText: We use the information we collect to:
useCase1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
useCase2: Process transactions and send related information
useCase3: Send technical notices and support messages
useCase4: Communicate with you about products, services, and events
informationSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
cookiesText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information to improve your experience.
thirdPartyServicesText: Our service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by us:
right1: Access and update your personal information
right2: Delete your account and associated data
right4: Request a copy of your data
policyChangesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacyContactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@example.com
